title: Can I get 25 rp asap? I need to buy radiant wukong before the sale endssss
body:
I am going to purchase $5= 650rp. I need 25 more rp to buy radiant wukong before the sale ends. 

I drew this picture just for this skin.

replies.body: Sorry for the delay!!! I'd hate for you to miss a great sale on an epic skin, be sure to refresh your client if you don't see the RP added ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=z9gV5tj7,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-12-15T05:31:25.870+0000)
>
> Sorry for the delay!!! I'd hate for you to miss a great sale on an epic skin, be sure to refresh your client if you don't see the RP added ^_^!
